casebody.data:
TILLMAN
v.
COMMERCIAL CREDIT. No. 360A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 12, 2006. G. Christopher Olson, Raleigh, for Tillman and Richardson. Jeffrey M. Young, Research Triangle Park, Christopher J. Willis, Richard H. Sinkfield, Atlanta, GA, for Commercial Credit, et al. Carlene McNulty, Mallam J. Maynard, F. Paul Bland, Jr., Washington, DC, for NC Justice Center, et al. Matthew W. Sawchak, Wendy I. Sexton, Raleigh, Alan S. Kaplinsky, Jeremy T. Rosenblum, Philadelphia, PA, Robert E. McKew, General Counsel and SVP, Washington, DC, for American Financial Ser., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of December 2006 by Plaintiffs for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of December 2006."
